law.catch_line: Person present may be compelled to testify.
law.text: A person present before a court or before a judicial officer may be compelled to testify in the same manner as if he were served with a subpoena.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 602.
